messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Dice was Kings Corner
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 10/6/03 8:18:56 PM Central Daylight Time, ... We went to the Teacher Store, and we left with a bunch of dice. ( And a Stop sign for his
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 10/6/03 8:18:56 PM Central Daylight Time,
jcurtielectric@... writes:
> anyway I think dice are good number
> pratice for kids :)
> Sonya


We went to the Teacher Store, and we left with a bunch of dice. ( And a Stop
sign for his bedroom door!) He loves them. There's a really cool one that's
big and clear with another little one inside it, he was practicing his
multiplication with it, having fun, seeing if he could get bigger and bigger numbers
without getting a low one, and other games he made up. We also love
Yahtzee, altho after four games in a row, I'm out. lol But his adding, and mine,
are getting much faster, because he wants to roll again.

He wants to go back and get more dice with more facets on them. But, so far,
he's just raided his Dad's D&D dice bag. lol

~Aimee


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
